com.brightcove.auth.ap.view

Class AdobePassLoginView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.AbsoluteLayout
          • android.webkit.WebView
            • com.brightcove.auth.ap.view.AdobePassLoginView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewGroup.OnHierarchyChangeListener, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalFocusChangeListener

    public class AdobePassLoginView
extends android.webkit.WebView
    WebView specifically designed to handle the Adobe Pass MVPD login. When the MVPD login is complete it will automatically call the AdobePassDelegate.finalizeAuthentication()

    Initiate and load as the standard WebView, but make sure to register the close listener by calling setCloseListener(CloseListener)

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Maximilian Nyman (max.nyman@anvilcreative.com)
    See Also:
    AdobePassDelegate.finalizeAuthentication(), AdobePassLoginView.CloseListener, WebView
